TopicTitle: We decided to play the Mega Lottery

Articles.Content:
We decided to turn it into a fun-family event since the lottery got so large ($640 Million).

We don\'t expect to win, we just wanted something to 'celebrate', and by that I simply mean get the family together for snacks and get excited for something.

Kinda like a Movie/Game night in a way.

But anyhow, if we win KSP can expect lots of money heading their way... ;P

That, of course, would be after we go into hiding for a solid week to avoid any potential crazy people who want to kill us >_>

Hehe, reality will set in eventually, don\'t worry

Murphy\'s law states you\'ll lose.

In response to myself:

Murphy\'s law states you\'ll lose.

In response to myself:

From the perspective of everyone else, I\'ll win 8)
Too late were you one of the 4 ppl who won?
